title: Understanding the Data Cleanup Menu
text: The 'Data cleanup' menu in Google Sheets is a feature designed to help organize and refine your data entries. It includes several tools that you may have seen before.

title: Familiar Cleaning Options
text: Consider processes like removing duplicate entries or excessive spaces which are common data refinement steps within spreadsheets.

title: Think of Typical Document Processes
text: Some options often associated with document writing rather than spreadsheets may not appear in the 'Data cleanup' menu.

title: Identify the Outlier
text: Which option on the list seems more like a spell-checking tool than a data-cleaning tool?
